fields.name: AppSubnetResourceId
fields.description: Resource ID of a subnet for control plane infrastructure components. This subnet must be in the same VNET as the subnet defined in appSubnetResourceId. Must not overlap with the IP range defined in platformReservedCidr, if defined.

fields.name: ControlPlaneSubnetResourceId
fields.description: Resource ID of a subnet for control plane infrastructure components. This subnet must be in the same VNET as the subnet defined in appSubnetResourceId. Must not overlap with the IP range defined in platformReservedCidr, if defined.

fields.name: DaprAIInstrumentationKey
fields.description: Azure Monitor instrumentation key used by Dapr to export Service to Service communication telemetry

fields.name: DockerBridgeCidr
fields.description: CIDR notation IP range assigned to the Docker bridge network. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges or the IP range defined in platformReservedCidr, if defined.

fields.name: PlatformReservedCidr
fields.description: IP range in CIDR notation that can be reserved for environment infrastructure IP addresses. It must not overlap with any other Subnet IP ranges.

fields.name: PlatformReservedDnsIP
fields.description: An IP address from the IP range defined by platformReservedCidr that will be reserved for the internal DNS server
